questionTitle: This is the ________ of the bicycle which was stolen.
It is ________ unlikely that the Queen will agree to open the new Town Hall.
I have lived near the railway for so long now that I've grown ________ to the noise of the trains.
She ________ me of the first time we met, when we knocked into each other with our umbrellas.
The noise got ________ as the car disappeared into the distance.
________ of all the staff, I would like to wish you a happy retirement.
While studying he depended ________ his wife for money.
Never before ________ seen such an enormous wedding cake.
I haven't heard from Pete for ages. I wish he ________ me his phone number before he left.
She needs a lot of help, but she always refuses ________ advice of any kind.
I must apologize ________ keeping you waiting so long.
I appealed ________ him for help.
He is responding to treatment and will soon be cured ________ his illness.
High in the sky a ________ of birds was flying southward.
A director ________ over all his employees.
It was ________ that I burnt my mouth.
I ________ to read this book before I found an interesting article about it.
As I was ________ through the newspaper this morning. I camme across a picture of an old army friend of mine.
Although the comedian was very clever, many of his remarks were ________ and ________ lawsuits against him for slander.
There is no ________ that the new agricultural policy has been in any way disastrous.
